page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: THE FOLLOWING FACTS ON LIFE-STYLES WERE OBTAINED. 1/2 HAD SUPPER. 5/8 READ IN BED. 5/8 WENT TO BED AFTER 2230. 1/2 HAD SCHOOL-AGED CHILDREN. 7/8 HAD GRAND PARENTS WHO WERE STILL ALIVE. 7/8 OWNED WASHING MACHINES AND 3/8 WENT TO THE LAUNDERETTE TO DO THEIR WASHING! 5/8 LIVED NEAR SHOPS. 2/3 OWNED A CAR. 5/8 OWNED A BICYCLE. 3/4 EAT PUDDING AT THE END OF DINNER. 3/4 HAD GARDEN SHEDS. 7/8 COULD SWIM. 3/4 WOULD PREFER A WHITE WEDDING. 95% HAD INDOOR W.C.s. THERE ARE FREQUENT BUS SERVICES TO GOSPORT AND FAREHAM TO LINK WITH TRAINS AND FERRIES. FEW PEOPLE ARE BLOOD DONORS. MOTHERS TEND NOT TO USE BABY CLINICS.
